title: The Construction Innovator Paradox: Why Innovative Construction Products May Face Digital Product Passports First
subtitle: How the two-route CE marking system under CPR 2024/3110 creates may make Digital Product Passports for innovate products mandatory before the harmonized standards are done
featuredImageAlt: Two routes to CE marking under the Construction Products Regulation — harmonised standards and European Assessment Documents — both leading to Digital Product Passport obligations
excerpt: Everyone assumes DPP obligations will roll out family by family. But the CPR's two-route CE marking system means innovative products using the EAD/ETA route could face Digital Product Passport requirements years before mainstream products covered by harmonised standards — and there is no way out.
